headline: Snowflake (SNOW) and IPG’s Acxiom Partner to Advance AI-Driven Marketing Innovation
summary: Snowflake Inc. (NYSE:SNOW) is one of the 13 best software stocks to buy now. On June 16, the company announced it had inked a strategic collaboration with Interpublic Group of Companies, Inc. (NYSE:IPG) Acxiom. The two are joining forces to enhance the delivery of modern AI-powered marketing data infrastructure. Their ultimate goal is transforming how […]
